title: Greek Salad
description: Crisp lettuce, tomatoes, cucumbers, red onions, olives, and feta cheese with a lemon-oregano vinaigrette.

title: Bruschetta
description: Grilled bread topped with a garlic rub, fresh tomatoes, basil, and extra virgin olive oil.

title: Pasta
description: Spaghetti tossed with a rich tomato sauce and fresh basil.

title: Grilled Fish
description: Fresh fish grilled to perfection with olive oil, garlic, and herbs, served with roasted vegetables.

title: Mixed Grill
description: A hearty platter of grilled meats including lamb, chicken, and beef skewers.

title: Lemon Dessert
description: A light and refreshing lemon cake with cream and candied zest.
